text: Anger of the Gods is a 2003 Burkinabé French drama movie directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo and starring Barou Oumar Ouedraogo, Rasmané Ouedraogo, Ina Cissé, Nouss Nabil. ==Other websites== * Category:2003 drama movies Category:Burkinabé movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Idrissa Ouedraogo
title: Anger of the Gods
